text:
You and your helper are responsible for cleaning and setting up equipment and monitoring vital signs. Can be stressful on family helpers.                 You must perform exchanges four to six times a day, every day.                 You must set up your cycler every night.                 You must take immunosuppressants every day for as long as the transplanted kidney functions.
                
More information about the treatments for kidney failure is provided in the NIDDK hea
